speaker: Doctor
text: Can you tell me more about when you started noticing the yellowish coloring of your skin and eyes? Was it sudden or did it develop gradually over time?

speaker: Patient
text: It started about a week ago, I guess. At first, I thought it was just a tan from being out with friends, but then I started noticing it was a bit more persistent, especially around my eyes.

speaker: Doctor
text: When did you first notice the change in the color of your skin and eyes, and was it accompanied by any other symptoms at that time?

speaker: Patient
text: It started as a yellowish tint, like a tan, but it spread to my eyes and now it's all over my skin, including my lips and tongue. I didn't notice anything else at first, but then I started feeling really anxious and agitated, like I couldn't calm down.
